com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.extensions

Interface ClientExtension<ExtensionView,ExtensionSettingsType>

  • Type Parameters:
    ExtensionView - The type of the view component of the extension.
    ExtensionSettingsType - The type of the settings component of the extension.
    All Superinterfaces:
    ExtensionPresenterFactory<ExtensionView,ExtensionSettingsType>, ExtensionViewFactory<ExtensionView>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvancedOptionsExtension, FilterExtension, SampleExtension, SampleExtension, SegmentationExtension, SynchronizedExtension

    public interface ClientExtension<ExtensionView,ExtensionSettingsType>
extends ExtensionViewFactory<ExtensionView>, ExtensionPresenterFactory<ExtensionView,ExtensionSettingsType>
    A ClientExtension is an extension to the Acrolinx Java SDK. It has two parts: a view component and a settings component.
